txt.en: 'This is hot work. Once we're done, it's inside for some well-deserved beer!'
'The Floating Log has needed these repairs for a long time.'
'We've repaired buildings all over the Shire. Inns are our specialty!'
'Sometimes the dwarves that pass through teach us songs to pass the time while we work. I can whistle better than most.'
'We're working as quickly as we can, while still doing a good job. That's important.'
